casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Stevens, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Stevens, 109 Ohio St.3d 1210, 2006-Ohio-2580.]

*1211(No. 2006-0102 Submitted April 25, 2006 Decided June 7, 2006.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and T. Allan Regas, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Saxon, 109 Ohio St.3d 176, 2006-Ohio-1245, 846 N.E.2d 824, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings consistent therewith.

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
